text:
Hi there,

I'd like to reserve a double room for two adults for the weekend of May 15-17. We will be arriving around 6 PM.

Thanks,
Sarah

Subject: Booking Inquiry

Good morning. I require a single room for a business trip from October 12th to October 15th, 2026. Do you have a corporate rate for longer stays?

Best regards,
John Smith
CEO, TechSolutions
hey, need a room for tonight. just me. checking in late.

Hello,

We are looking to book a family suite for 2 adults and 2 children (ages 4 and 7). We need the room from July 1st to July 7th. A cot would be appreciated.

Cheers.
Can I get a quote for a Deluxe King room for 3 nights starting next Friday? Just wondering about the price before I book.
I need to cancel my reservation for next week (Conf #88392). My flight got cancelled so I can't make it.

Hi,

I have a reservation under the name Mike Ross for August 20th. Is it possible to change the dates to August 22nd-24th instead?

Let me know if there is a fee.
Do you have any availability for a wedding group of about 10 people for the weekend of September 12th?

To Whom It May Concern,

I would like to book 3 standard double rooms for our sales team. Check-in: June 10, 2026. Check-out: June 12, 2026. Please send the invoice to this email address.
Need a room for 2 nights. Arriving tomorrow. Standard is fine.
I stayed there last week and think I left my charger in room 302. Can you check?
reserving a room for Dec 24-26. 2 adults. king bed preferred.
Hello, how much is the presidential suite per night? We are planning a honeymoon.
Please modify my booking (Ref: GH-9921). We need to add one more person to the room, so we might need a rollaway bed.
Are you pet friendly? We want to bring our dog.
Booking request: April 5th to 8th. Single occupancy. Non-smoking please.
Hi, I need to shorten my stay. Instead of checking out on the 10th, I'll be leaving on the 9th. Reservation #12345.
Is the swimming pool open next month?
URGENT: Cancel reservation 55421 immediately.
Do you have any twin rooms left for the dates 12/05/2026 to 14/05/2026?

Hi,

I'd like to book a room for my parents. They will be arriving on Saturday and staying for 4 nights. They need a ground floor room if possible as they have trouble with stairs.

Thanks!
What is the rate for a standard room including breakfast?
reservation for mr and mrs jones, 3 nights from may 1st. king bed.
I'd like to book the conference room for a meeting on Tuesday, along with 5 guest rooms for attendees.
Change date please. Res #777. Move to next month same days.

Hi team,

Looking to book accommodation for our annual retreat. We need 15 rooms for November 10-12. Do you have capacity?
cancel my booking. name is david lee.

Hello,

I was wondering if you have any rooms with a sea view available for the weekend of August 1st?

Best,
Jenny
I need to book a room for tonight. Late check in around 11pm. Is that okay?
Please reserve a suite for 2 adults and 1 child for the nights of Oct 31 and Nov 1.
Can I upgrade my room to a deluxe? My booking ref is KLO-992.
How much does it cost to add breakfast to my existing booking?

Hi,

I need a room for 12/12 to 12/15. Just me. 

Sent from my iPhone
Do you have availability for tonight? My flight was delayed.
I have a complaint about the noise level during my last stay.
Booking for 2 people, twin beds. Arriving June 10, departing June 14. Thanks.
Please cancel reservation #99912. Found a different place.
I need to change the name on the reservation from Sarah Conner to John Conner. Confirmation #T800.

Hi,

What are your rates for a long-term stay (30+ days)?
booking 1 night. 3rd march. single room.

Hello,

We would like to make a reservation for our anniversary. Do you have any special packages? We need a room for Sept 22-24.

Thanks!
Is there parking available at the hotel?
I need to push my arrival date back by one day. I'll arrive on the 5th now. Res #ABC.
Do you have any rooms with a balcony available for next week?
Please reserve 2 double rooms for the Smith family. Arriving July 4, staying 2 nights.
cancel booking for tomorrow. sorry for late notice.

Hi,

I'm looking at your website and it says sold out, but I wanted to double check if you have any cancellations for May 20th?
I want to book a room. 2 adults. May 5 to May 10.
What is the price for a double room on New Year's Eve?
please book a room for me, check in date 11/11/25 check out 14/11/25. quiet room preferred.
I need to change my booking to a twin room instead of a double. My colleague is joining me. Ref: 123456.
Room needed for 3 nights. Start date: Aug 15. Guests: 1.
Hi, we need to cancel our trip due to illness. Please refund our deposit. Booking ID 55521.
Can I book a room for a few hours during the day? I have a layover.
How much for a family room for 2 adults and 3 kids?

RE: Reservation

I'd like to confirm a booking for Mr. Bond. Skyfall Suite. July 7th.
Do you have any vacancies for the jazz festival weekend?

Hello,

I made a mistake on my booking (Conf #112233). I put 1 adult but it should be 2. Can you fix this?
Book a king room for me. 2 nights. Arriving this Friday.
I'm looking for a venue for a birthday party. Do you rent out your hall?

Hi,

Please reserve a room with wheelchair access for Sept 10-12. 2 adults.
Can you give me the best price for a group of 20 students?
Cancel my room. Reservation 8821.
I need a room for tonight only. Cheap one is fine.
We need 3 rooms for a bachelorette party. June 1-3. Close to each other if possible.
Hi, can I change my check-out date? I need to stay one extra night. Current reservation is under Green.
Are there any rooms left for the Christmas holidays?
Booking request: 1 Suite, 2 nights, Check-in 2026-04-01.
What's the cost of a deluxe room vs a standard room?
Please book 2 single rooms for our drivers. Arriving midnight tonight.
Cancel reservation for Smith. Unexpected emergency.

Hi,

I'd like to book the penthouse for a private event on Dec 31st.
My flight time changed. Can I change my booking to arrive a day earlier? Ref #9988.
Do you have a gym?
room for 2. 1 night. saturday.

Good afternoon,

I would like to reserve accommodation for a visiting professor. Dates: March 3rd to March 10th. Single occupancy, quiet room necessary for work.
Is breakfast included in the room rate?
I need to cancel. My cat got sick.
Hi there, checking availablity for a double room next tuesday for 3 nights.
Please reserve a room with two queen beds for 4 guests. June 18-20.
I need to change my credit card details for the reservation #1234.
Book me a room. 15th to 17th. Thanks.
Hello, do you offer airport pickup?
I'd like to book a room near the elevator please. May 1-5.
Can you check if there is a room available for tonight? Just walked into town.
Price check for a suite on Feb 14th?
Please cancel my reservation (ID: 555-123).

Hi,

I need a room for 2 adults and an infant. Do you provide cribs? Dates: Aug 5-8.
I entered the wrong date. I need June 5th, not July 5th. Can you swap it? Ref #QWERTY.
Booking Inquiry: 5 nights, starting Monday. King bed.
I'd like to reserve a block of rooms for a wedding. 10 rooms total. June 2027.
How much for a single room for just one night?
Do you have any availability for the first week of October?
reserve room. 2 ppl. tomorrow night.
I need to postpone my trip. Can I move my booking to next year? Ref #111.

Hi,

I'd like to book a luxury suite for my wife's birthday. November 12th weekend.
cancel booking
What time is check-out?
I want to book a room with a view of the park. April 10-12.
Please confirm availability for a twin room on March 15th.
